entry.title: New release for Tangerine UI: v2.1
entry.content:
Thank you all for your amazing feedback following the release of Tangerine UI v2.0 üíõ Here's a follow-up release with some small fixes:

‚ú® Improved

  • Added back the unread "glow" at the top of a column when there are new posts available (#119)
  • Harmonized spacing between action icons (Reply, Boost, Favorite, Bookmark, etc.)
  • Added a subtle outline around post headers in the timeline for legibility

üî® Fixed

  • Fixed the icon alignment inside the logged-out interaction modals
  • Fixed the explainer text color inside the logged-out interaction modals
  • Fixed #118: Author attribution text wraps in the Advanced View

entry.title: New release for Tangerine UI: v2.2
entry.content:

entry.title: New release for Tangerine UI: v2.3
entry.content:
Tangerine UI v2.3 fixes some layout issues introduced with Mastodon 4.3.2, among other small things:

üî® Fixed

  • Fixed #131: Preview card with image and long content has broken padding in Advanced View
  • Fixed #130 and #135: On small screens, the column header could overlap with the content.
  • Fixed #132: ALT text popovers don't follow the dark or light theme.
  • Fixed: Inconsistent background masking above header on larger screens.

entry.title: New release for Tangerine UI: v2.4
entry.content:
Tangerine UI v2.4 brings the theme up to date with Mastodon 4.4, with support for all the new features included in the release, bug fixes, and more.

‚ú≥Ô∏è New

  • Support for displaying Quote Posts
  • Support for Mastodon's revamped navigation on smaller screens
  • Support for the new Featured tab on profile pages
  • Support for the new Pinned posts carousel on profile pages
  • Support for the new List editor
  • Support for the new account relationship labels on profile pages

‚ú® Updated

  • Avatars in the Notifications tab are now larger
  • Improved look for the video player overlay

üî® Fixed

  • Fixed #138: Changes to search broke icon alignment
  • Fixed #146: Video player covers interaction buttons and even other posts
  • Fixed #154: Truncate the text inside preview cards to a few lines
  • Fixed #156: Boost confirmation popup has a gray background
  • Many other minor visual fixes and tweaks

And here‚Äôs my take on the new pinned posts carousel in Mastodon 4.4:

‚Ä¢ More compact in height
‚Ä¢ Bigger Next and Previous buttons
‚Ä¢ Made it so the next post always peeks out from the right edge of the carousel to let you know it's there

‚Äî @nileane@nileane.fr
